```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(tidyboot)
library(jsonlite)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r}
barriers <- read_csv('barrier_sizes_plot.csv') %>%
  group_by(barrier_size) %>%
  filter(training_step <= 220000) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = training_step,
             y = norm_dist,
             color = barrier_size)) + 
  #geom_point() + 
  #geom_line() + 
  geom_smooth() + 
  ylim(0,2) + 
  theme_few() 
barriers
```

barriers <- read_csv('barrier_sizes_plot.csv') %>%

 filter(training_step >= 219904) %>%
